cards.rules_text:

Whenever Hakari attacks, roll three d6. Create a Treasure token for each result of 6. Then do the following based on the number of dice with results of 4 or greater. 
[b]1+ [/b]| Put a +1/+1 counter on Hakari.
[b]2+ [/b]| Hakari gains trample until end of turn.
[b]3+ [/b]| Hakari gains first strike until end of turn.
